title: veOCEAN
description: Fork of veCRV contracts which have been battle-tested over years.

title: Weekly Rewards
description: Data Farming Rounds run weekly, with rewards distributed at the end of each round.

title: For Everyone
description: Numerous participants can benefit from the different reward programs available.

title: Ranked Rewards
description: Rewards are distributed by rank to the top 100 assets.

title: Publisher 2X Stake
description: Publishers get an effective 2x stake when allocating on their own assets.

title: No Impermanent Loss
description: veOCEAN holders do not suffer imperative losses from LP/AMM mechanisms.
